**Tender Notice: Highway Coach with Operators**

* **Reference number**: WS3726546752-Doc3791654043
* **Publication date**: December 15, 2022
* **Closing date**: January 3, 2023, at 14:00 EST

This *Request for Standing Offer* (RFSO) solicits offers from transportation service providers to deliver charter bus services for the Department of National Defence (DND) Edmonton Garrison, Edmonton, Alberta.

## Notice Details

* **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Contract Duration**: 3 years (February 1, 2023, to January 31, 2026)
* **Selected Suppliers**: Up to two (2) standing offers may be issued

## Services Required

* Provide transportation services for passengers using highway cruisers (40 passenger and above) with operators
* Deliver services from DND Base Edmonton, AB, to training areas in:
	+ All of Canada
	+ The United States

## Key Requirements

* Services are to be provided on an "as and when required" basis
* Trips normally begin and end at Edmonton Garrison, unless otherwise directed by the Call-Up Authority
* Offerors must report to the pick-up point specified at the time of the call-up by the Identified User

## Trade Agreements

* This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Pre-qualification Requirements

Before submitting an offer, suppliers must ensure compliance with all applicable requirements outlined in the Solicitation Document.

## Contact Information

* **Contact**: Havrilenko, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: N/A
* **Fax**: N/A

## Additional Information

* This notice was originally advertised on Ariba Discovery with an amendment to the closing time.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 3, 2023, at 14:00 EST.
